title: Sherlock Holmes, The Strangest Cases : Official Edition
description: Sherlock Holmes has a lot of stories written by his creator Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. This is a selection of some of his strangest cases including masterpieces like: Silver Blaze, The Adventure of the Cardboard Box, The Yellow Face, The Stockbroker’s Clerk, The “Gloria Scott”, and The Musgrave Ritual.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
